layout.name: changeSize
layout.title: Change Size
layout.tooltip: Whether or not the size of the NPC is changed while it comes out and retracts.

children.name: override
children.title: Use Per-NPC Settings
children.tooltip: When checked, per-NPC settings will be used for these settings in place of NPC config values.

children.name: movementSpeed
children.title: Movement Speed
children.tooltip: How fast the NPC moves when coming out or retracting back.

children.name: hideTime
children.title: Hide Time
children.tooltip: How long the NPC rests before coming out.

children.name: restTime
children.title: Rest Time
children.tooltip: How long the NPC rests before retracting back.

children.name: ignorePlayers
children.title: Ignore Players
children.tooltip: Whether or not the NPC can come out, even if there's a player in the way.

children.name: override
children.title: Use Per-NPC Settings
children.tooltip: When checked, per-NPC settings will be used for these settings in place of NPC config values.

children.name: fireID
children.title: Fire ID
children.tooltip: The NPC ID of the fire shot by the NPC. If nil or 0, no fire will be shot.

children.name: fireSpurts
children.title: Fire Spurts
children.tooltip: How many "spurts" of fire the NPC will shoot before retracting.

children.name: firePerSpurt
children.title: Fire Per Spurts
children.tooltip: How many fire NPCs are shot in each "spurt".

children.name: fireSpurtDelay
children.title: Fire Spurt Delay
children.tooltip: How many frames of delay there are between each "spurt".

children.name: fireSpeed
children.title: Fire Speed
children.tooltip: The speed of each fire NPC shot by the NPC.

children.name: fireAngle
children.title: Fire Angle
children.tooltip: The angle of each fire NPC shot by the NPC. Increases with each spurt.
